calc_orf(frequencies, det1_vertex, ...[, ...])

Calculates the tensor, scalar, and vector overlap reduction functions Following Section IVb of https://arxiv.org/abs/0903.0528 See Appendix A of https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.08373 for a discussion of the normalization of the scalar ORF and https://arxiv.org/pdf/0707.0535.pdf for the gamma_V function
